text: Need Peyton Stewart for Kmart camp. Budget around $28,820, looking for 2 x Twitter post, 2 x Podcast guest, 1 x Professional headshots, 1 x 15-second TikTok, 3 x Instagram story. 9 week exclusivity from other similar brands. Campaign runs October 2025. Usage rights for 8 months. Engagement period: 5 months.
